question:
Consider the following temples with dynasties under which they were built:
  1. Madurai Amman Temple - Nayakas
  2. Lad Khan Temple - Chalukyas
  3. Kailasanathar Temple - Pallavas
Which of the above is/are correctly matched?
explanation: All are correctly matched. The Nayakas build Madurai Amman Temple in Tamil Nadu. The Chalukyas built Lad Khan Temple in Karnataka. The Pallavas built Kailasnath temple in Ellora caves.
